column2: "EWURADZE ngye wo do wɔ ɔfona da no mu; Ma ɔno a ɔyɛ Jakob ne Nyankopɔn no mfa wo nsi sorsor;"
"Na omfi krɔnkrɔnbea no mbɛyɛ wo mboa. Ma omfi Zion Bepɔw do mbɛhyɛ wo dzen;"

column3: Na ɔmpen wo hyew afɔr do mma wo."
Na ɔmma wo tsirmsɛm nyinara mbra mu."

column2: "Ma yɛmbɔ ose wɔ wo konyimdzi ho
column3: Na hɛn Nyankopɔn dzin mu na yebesi hɛn mfrankaa: EWURADZE mma w’ebisadze nyinara mbra mu."

column2: "Afei na mehu dɛ EWURADZE gye ne nyia wɔasera no no nkwa; Ofi no sor krɔnkrɔn no bɛgye no do Ɔdze ne nsa enyimfa ahoɔdzen no bɛgye no."

column3: na binom twer mpɔnkɔ: Na hɛn dze
column4: yɛbɔbɔ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ne dzin."

column2: "Hɔn na wɔkotokotow na wɔhwehwe ase: Na hɛn dze

column3: ma ɔhen konyimdzi: Sɛ yɛfrɛ wo a
